text: Sheikhul Bandi is one of the 51 Union Council (sub-divisions) of Abbottabad District in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. It is in the valley toward the north-west of the Sarban Hills. It is located at 34°8'60N, 73°13'60E Falling Rain - Location of Sheikhul Bandi == People== Most people of Sheikhul Bandi are the Jadoons. The main language is Hindko although Urdu and pashto is also spoken and understood. ==Subdivisions== The Union Council is subdivided into the following areas: Cantonment, Qasba Abbottabad, Sheikhulbandi and Rakh Civil Military. ==References== Category:Union councils of Abbottabad District
title: Sheikhul Bandi
